message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by both you and me. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it provides, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. Would you like to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $10,800? This offer is valid for a limited time only, so don't miss out on this opportunity to own a product that truly exceeds your expectations.
